knimeNode.name: PIACompiler
knimeNode.shortDescription: Compile PIA intermediate XML file from raw search engine results.

intro.p: Compile PIA intermediate XML file from raw search engine results.

fullDescription.option: Additional Java settings, like giving Java a big enough amount of memory.

ports.inPort: Search engine result files to compile into PIA-XML file. [mzid,dat,msf,t.xml,xml,idxml]

views.view: The text sent to standard out during the execution of PIACompiler.
The text sent to standard error during the execution of PIACompiler. (If it appears in gray, it's the output of a previously failing run which is preserved for your trouble shooting.)
